long_description: The Yakima HighLite 3 hitch bike rack is a breeze to use! Lightweight construction makes it hassle-free to install, while integrated lock keeps bikes safe. SwitchBlade anti-sway bike cradles eliminate bike-to-bike contact and bike-to-vehicle contact. Intuitive levers with anti-pinch trigger covers make operating a simple endeavor; arms fold down for easy storage. Once bikes are removed, hitch mount tilts away for instant rear-of-vehicle access. Fits most types of bicycles; top-tube adapter sold separately to carry odd-shaped frames. Integrated security cable included so you can lock bikes to rack. Includes a hitch lock to lock rack onto your hitch. Yakima HighLite 3 hitch rack comes with 2 integrated bottle openers. Fits 2 in. and 1.25 in. receiver hitches; designed for Class II hitches and higher. Not intended for tandem or recumbent bikes; carrying bikes with step-through frames requires the purchase of an adapter (sold separately).
short_description: The Yakima HighLite 3 hitch bike rack is a breeze to use! Lightweight construction makes it hassle-free to install, while integrated lock keeps bikes safe.
